question.title: Find Candidates for Data Scientist Position II
question.translatedTitle: 寻找数据科学家职位的候选人 II
mysqlSchemas: Create table if not exists Candidates(candidate_id int, skill varchar(50), proficiency int)
Create table if not exists Projects( project_id int, skill varchar(50), importance int)
Truncate table Candidates
insert into Candidates (candidate_id, skill, proficiency) values ('101', 'Python', '5')

Truncate table Projects
